name: SKUMP MP
description:
SKUMP MULTIPLAYER

Play an amazingly addictive ALL NEW GENRE OF A GAME -

SCROLL JUMP RACING with family and friends.

Jump and jump and try to overtake your multiplayer partner by using rockets, power ups and not falling on obstacles, false platforms and enjoys an amazing playing experience.

We have all played DOODLE JUMP but miss the multiplayer game like that. BUT NOW IT IS HERE with more functionalities.

Enjoy SKUMPING and please download it to increase its CYBERPUNK GAME JAM RATING.
